title: Riven is not high skill cap
body:
And neither is Fiora or Talon.

They are great champions, there's nothing wrong with not being high skillcap, but everyone just says they are high skillcap when they're probably medium skill cap. Compare Riven and Fiora to actually high skillcap champions like Lee Sin (if you miss his Q you're probably useless for 15 seconds), Cassiopeia (everything about her is high skillcap) and other champions where almost every ability is a skillshot and you'll see the difference in skillcap.
